tools.name: google_ads_batch_create_campaigns
tools.description: Create multiple campaigns in a single batch operation with support for partial failure - some campaigns may succeed while others fail.
tools.purpose: Efficiently create multiple campaigns at once instead of one at a time
tools.when_to_use: When launching multiple campaigns simultaneously or migrating from another platform

required_parameters.name: customer_id
required_parameters.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no hyphens)

required_parameters.name: campaigns_json
required_parameters.description: JSON array of campaign configurations with name, type, status, budget, and bidding settings

returns.description: Formatted markdown report showing total campaigns, succeeded count, failed count, and details of each result

tools.name: google_ads_batch_create_ad_groups
tools.description: Create multiple ad groups in a single batch operation.
tools.purpose: Efficiently create multiple ad groups across campaigns
tools.when_to_use: When setting up campaign structure or expanding existing campaigns

required_parameters.name: customer_id
required_parameters.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no hyphens)

required_parameters.name: ad_groups_json
required_parameters.description: JSON array of ad group configurations with name, campaign_id, status, and cpc_bid

returns.description: Batch operation result with success/failure details for each ad group

tools.name: google_ads_batch_add_keywords
tools.description: Add multiple keywords in a single batch operation.
tools.purpose: Efficiently add keywords to ad groups in bulk
tools.when_to_use: When populating ad groups with keyword lists or importing keywords from research

required_parameters.name: customer_id
required_parameters.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no hyphens)

required_parameters.name: keywords_json
required_parameters.description: JSON array of keyword configurations with ad_group_id, text, match_type, and cpc_bid

returns.description: Batch operation result showing successfully added keywords and failures

tools.name: google_ads_batch_create_ads
tools.description: Create multiple responsive search ads in a single batch operation.
tools.purpose: Efficiently create multiple ads across ad groups
tools.when_to_use: When scaling ad creative testing or launching new campaigns with multiple ads

required_parameters.name: customer_id
required_parameters.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no hyphens)

required_parameters.name: ads_json
required_parameters.description: JSON array of ad configurations with ad_group_id, headlines (3-15), descriptions (2-4), and final_urls

returns.description: Batch operation result with created ad IDs and failures

tools.name: google_ads_batch_update_budgets
tools.description: Update budgets for multiple campaigns in a single batch operation.
tools.purpose: Efficiently adjust campaign budgets in bulk
tools.when_to_use: When rebalancing budgets across campaigns or making seasonal adjustments

required_parameters.name: customer_id
required_parameters.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no hyphens)

required_parameters.name: budget_updates_json
required_parameters.description: JSON array with campaign_id and budget_amount for each campaign

returns.description: Table showing updated budgets for each campaign

tools.name: google_ads_batch_update_bids
tools.description: Update CPC bids for multiple keywords or ad groups in a single batch operation.
tools.purpose: Efficiently adjust bids across keywords or ad groups
tools.when_to_use: When optimizing bids based on performance data or competitive analysis

required_parameters.name: customer_id
required_parameters.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no hyphens)

required_parameters.name: entity_type
required_parameters.description: Type of entity: 'keyword' or 'ad_group'

required_parameters.name: bid_updates_json
required_parameters.description: JSON array with entity IDs and new cpc_bid values

returns.description: Table showing updated bids for each entity

tools.name: google_ads_batch_pause_campaigns
tools.description: Pause multiple campaigns in a single batch operation.
tools.when_to_use: When temporarily stopping campaigns for holidays, budget constraints, or testing

required_parameters.name: customer_id
required_parameters.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no hyphens)

required_parameters.name: campaign_ids
required_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of campaign IDs to pause

tools.name: google_ads_batch_enable_campaigns
tools.description: Enable multiple campaigns in a single batch operation.
tools.when_to_use: When resuming campaigns after testing or seasonal pauses

required_parameters.name: customer_id
required_parameters.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no hyphens)

required_parameters.name: campaign_ids
required_parameters.description: Comma-separated list of campaign IDs to enable

tools.name: google_ads_batch_status_change
tools.description: Change status for multiple entities (campaigns, ad groups, keywords, ads) in a single operation.
tools.purpose: Bulk status updates across any entity type
tools.when_to_use: When managing status across multiple entities of the same type

required_parameters.name: customer_id
required_parameters.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no hyphens)

required_parameters.name: entity_type
required_parameters.description: Type of entity: campaign, ad_group, keyword, or ad

required_parameters.name: status_updates_json
required_parameters.description: JSON array with entity_id and status for each entity

returns.description: Table showing updated status for each entity

tools.name: google_ads_export_to_csv
tools.description: Export account structure (campaigns, keywords) to CSV format for backup or analysis.
tools.purpose: Create CSV exports of account data
tools.when_to_use: When backing up account structure or analyzing data in spreadsheets

required_parameters.name: customer_id
required_parameters.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no hyphens)

required_parameters.name: entity_type
required_parameters.description: Type to export: campaigns or keywords

optional_parameters.name: campaign_id
optional_parameters.description: Optional campaign ID filter (for keywords export)

returns.description: CSV formatted data in code block

tools.name: google_ads_import_from_csv
tools.description: Import entities from CSV format for bulk creation.
tools.purpose: Bulk create entities from CSV data
tools.when_to_use: When migrating from another platform or restoring from backup

required_parameters.name: customer_id
required_parameters.description: Google Ads customer ID (10 digits, no hyphens)

required_parameters.name: entity_type
required_parameters.description: Type to import: campaigns or keywords

required_parameters.name: csv_data
required_parameters.description: CSV formatted data with header row
